data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Flevoland, Netherlands the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Flevoland, Netherlands
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Flevoland a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 24 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Flevoland, Netherlands be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Flevoland to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Albanian people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 14,775 believers in Flevoland, Netherlands a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Flevoland, Netherlands to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.section_summary:
the state of Flevoland, Netherlands has a population of 368,200.

We estimate Flevoland has 14,775 people who might know Jesus, 157,792 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 195,632 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 24 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Flevoland words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."
